title: Add rails_helper
body_html: This PR moves the Rails specific config to spec/rails_helper.rb. It's the default for the rspec-rails gem for quite a while now and also enables unit-testing without loading the Rails environment (= takes looong) by just requiring spec/spec_helper.rb (which is indeed required automatically by .rspec now).

body: This PR moves the Rails specific config to `spec/rails_helper.rb`. It's the default for the rspec-rails gem for quite a while now and also enables unit-testing without loading the Rails environment (= takes looong) by just requiring `spec/spec_helper.rb` (which is indeed required automatically by `.rspec` now).
